Agathion.question: Hey, let's play a game! Guess what I wanna eat!

Andras.question: If you capture me, what you going to do to me?
Andras.a: Eat you in a hot pot
Andras.c: You'll be my new stylish coat

Angel.question: Hey. Aren't you hungry? Can we take a break and go eat somewhere?
Angel.a: Eat you in a hot pot
Angel.c: You'll be my new stylish coat

Anubis.question: Hey. So whaddya think when you think about the future?
Anubis.c: I just want to enjoy the now

Anzu.question: Me am really in soup, now. Do what you want. Me am ready if you want grill me, so...
Anzu.a: OK, I'll make you into soup

Apsaras.question: I wonder if us speaking together like this now means that we are somehow connected...

Arahabaki.question: So why me in this situation right now? Why me at your mercy?

Archangel.question: Do you seek friendly competition with a beloved neighbor? Or have you come to destroy a hated foe?

Arsene.question: I am the rebel's soul that resides within you. If you so desire, I shall consider granting you the power to break through this crisis.
Arsene.response: Hmph, very well... This power of mine is yours!

Baal.question: As far as you're concerned, what kind of person was I to you?

Baphomet.question: A bad rep spreads like wildfire. If I were you, I'd quit all this nonsense. What's the point?
Baphomet.c: I don't know any other way

Barong.question: Ah, it's a shame. If I'd taken this seriously from the start, I wouldn't be in this sorry state

Belphegor.question: Somethin' bad happen in yer life or somethin', sonny?

Berith.question: What kinda fate do you think there is in this meetin' between me and you?
Berith.c: I want to end this fate

Bicorn.question: Know how they say, Be kind ta yer elders? Has no one ever taught you that?
Bicorn.c: I don't want to grow old

Black Ooze.question: They always give the guys katsudon! You got anything like that for me!?

Cerberus.question: You go back to your mother' arms. You need take nap now
Cerberus.c: Mom will wait till I'm done

Chernobog.question: ...Who the blazes do you think you are?
Chernobog.c: I don't have to answer you

Choronzon.question: Hey, sonny if somethin's been botherin' you. I'm willing to give you a listen.

Dakini.question: Don't you think it's sad that slang and sayings can grow old and get outdated?

Decarabia.question: Hey. So whaddya think when you think about the future?
Decarabia.c: I just want to enjoy the now

Dominion.question: That power, vow that you will use it in the name of our Father

Eligor.question: Y'know, if I'm gonna be killed, I'd rather be offed by some beautiful, classy woman
Eligor.b: You don't get to be picky

Fuu-Ki.question: A bad rep spreads like wildfire. If I were you, I'd quit all this nonsense. What's the point?
Fuu-Ki.c: I don't know any other way

Ganesha.question: I know when I'm gettin' all sweaty. I'm glistenin', ain't I?

Garuda.question: What you thinking now?
Garuda.b: I need a new cell phone
Garuda.c: I want girls to like me

Hanuman.question: What kinda fate do you think there is in this meetin' between me and you?
Hanuman.c: I want to end this fate

High Pixie.question: I'm inclined to turn you down, but if you still wish to speak, I will perhaps consider it

Hua Po.question: If your girlfriend asked if you were free to have dinner with her friends, what would you say?

Incubus.question: They always give the guys katsudon! You got anything like that for me!?

Inugami.question: Me guessing you have power that me not have. But what is it...?

Ippon-Datara.question: Hey. Why aren't you at school?

Isis.question: ...I'm not going to go easy on you for doing something like this, you know...

Jack Frost.question: Have you made an appointment, ho?
Jack Frost.c: Just tell me what you know

Kaiwan.question: It'd prolly be a big downer if the birthday boy didn't show to his party, sooo...

Kali.question: But I've been around the block, so I know--there's something else you want from me, isn't there?

Kelpie.question: What you thinking now?
Kelpie.b: I need a new cell phone
Kelpie.c: I want girls to like me

Kikuri-Hime.question: What is irritating you so much?

Kin-Ki.question: Me really want to eat something

Kodama.question: When you eat curry, mister, what do you like to add?

Koppa Tengu.question: ...So uh, instead of killin' me, you started chattin' with me... You tryin' to get somethin' from me?

Koropokkuru.question: Y'know, if I'm gonna be killed, I'd rather be offed by some beautiful, classy woman
Koropokkuru.b: You don't get to be picky

Kumbhanda.question: Hey, if you got any medicine, lend me some. They're supposed ta work miracles, right...?

Kushinada-Hime.question: ...Hey, there's no need for all this, right? Let's drop the drama and just go get something to eat. The thought has crossed your mind, hasn't it? Come on, where would you take me?

Lamia.question: I've been sending you serious don't speak to me vibes
Lamia.c: But we may never meet again...

Lilim.question: Hey mister, if I grew up, what do you think the future me would've been like

Lilith.question: You know, if I were to whip something up for you, what would you want?

Makami.question: You go back to your mother' arms. You need take nap now.
Makami.c: Mom will wait till I'm done

Mandrake.question: We'll just say you win. So can we stop this?

Melchizedek.question: Therefore, I cannot be destroyed. Desist from this pointlessness.?

Mithras.question: If I'd known things would end like this, I wish I had found the courage to ask that girl out...

Mokoi.question: It's cliched, but we could chat about life... Ask each other things like what kind of girls we like...

Moloch.question: What's wrong with the way I look, huh?

Mot.question: If you capture me, what you going to do to me?
Mot.a: Eat you in a hot pot
Mot.c: You'll be my new stylish coat

Mothman.question: So why me in this situation right now? Why me at your mercy?

Naga.question: As far as you're concerned, what kind of person was I to you?

Narcissus.question: I mean, how does it feel to wave your gun at an enemy who's completely lost the will to fight?

Nebiros.question: The truth is... You're a good person, aren't you?

Nekomata.question: I lost. Here I lay, at your feet, at your mercy. Just what do you want from me?

Norn.question: Won't you just leave me be?

Nue.question: There something you want say to me, right?

Obariyon.question: Aren't people as old as you s'posed to go dating, all the time? Can't you get some dates?

Oberon.question: If your parents could see you now, I'm sure it would break their hearts...

Oni.question: If yer gonna kill me, do me a solid and make it quick

Onmoraki.question: I'm tired of being a kid. Didn't you feel that way when you were little, too?
Onmoraki.c: I want to be a kid forever

Orobas.question: You have no idea I was about to use my ultimate move

Orthrus.question: You given much thought, what if you go to place where you could die at any moment?

Ose.question: You're violatin' the weapons code or whatever, man
Ose.b: Not if no one finds out

Parvati.question: Why have you decided to be more communicative with me?

Pisaca.question: I know when I'm gettin' all sweaty. I'm glistenin', ain't I?

Pixie.question: What do you think I should wear? I admit it, I wanna draw some attention to myself

Power.question: To view me as an enemy is to incur our Father's wrath. Man's future rests in your hands
Power.a: What are you trying to say?

Queen Mab.question: Ah, so I suppose you commit such extreme acts because you know you won't be punished harshly...

Rakshasa.question: ...Um, why're you going' for me? Ain't there worse people out there? What kind of guys piss you off?

Rangda.question: When I was young, I could make anyone back off - if they were smart enough - with just my glare

Sarasvati.question: I wonder if us speaking together like this now means that we are somehow connected...

Scathach.question: Ah, so I suppose you commit such extreme acts because you know you won't be punished harshly...

Shiki-Ouji.question: So me am going to haunt you for the rest of your life. Me always right behind you...

Silky.question: ...I'm not going to go easy on you for doing something like this, you know...

Skadi.question: They wear sleeveless shirts in the winter, right? What do you think about that, dearie?

Slime.question: Me want to ask some recommendations, so me can at least imagine
Slime.b: Ice cream off the carton lid

Succubus.question: I'll go out with you just for today if there are no strings attached
Succubus.c: I've got enough on my plate...

Sui-Ki.question: So who're you tryin' to impress with that mask?

Take-Minakata.question: You knocked me down, and now my goddamn watch is broken!

Thoth.question: Why you fight and put yourself in harm's way?

Titania.question: I suppose this real world where you come from must be fairly boring

Unicorn.question: You not worry you get in trouble if those groups hear what you are doing to me?

Valkyrie.question: I insist you surrender yourself to the authorities

Yaksini.question: I've heard that love can bloom anywhere, even on a battlefield. Don't you think that's possible?

Yamata-no-Orochi.question: It look like you corner me... But how me know this not trick? How me know you really winning?
